name: A Sith's Weapon
Lore: 'Lightsaber confrontations are a complex dance of feints, strikes, parries and footwork. Mistakes are rarely forgiven.',
Text: 'Deploy on table.  Once per turn, if your character of ability > 4 just failed to ''hit'' an [Episode I] Jedi (or [Virtual Block 6] Luke) with a non-[Permanent Weapon] lightsaber, may lose 1 Force to ''swing'' at target again.  May place in Used Pile to cancel Obi-Wan''s Journal.',
